participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and adventurous, enjoys sharing experiences about literature and travel.
participant_1.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i am a librarian. i'm 60 years old. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: casual and laid-back, loves spending time with family and has a passion for reading.
participant_2.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

content.text: Alright mate? i like to read and play with my son.
i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore.
I like to go to the library.
I do. i love to read.
I read a lot, i love to read
It seems that true answer is: travel
